-e ---

𓀁 am(I) 𓀁 "I" me moi mouth 𓂋 mek ego yek 𓀁 क 𓎡 1 one 𓅱 Einer :

𔐀 ego I

𓀁 mostly used for adjectives and verbs vs 𓀀 for persons and groups (vs 𓀂 sic!)

𓀁 क qui que ki this (by (me)) deictics pointing pronouns lost in some pie
𓀁 ᶥⲕᶥ EGO ich yek :
𓀁 ac Ⰰ az Azъ ich

𓂝 𓅓 𓀁 ⲱⲙⲕ ōmk (swallow)

𓀁 "ER" (person) ren 𓂋 𓆇EinEr𓂋

sit in 𓈖 𓎛 𓀁 | pray for, prayer | 𒉆𒋖 namšita 𒋖
